episodes.synopsis: After an explosion tears apart an English city, photojournalist Jennifer Preston notices people acting strangely and ghostly images in her pictures.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Jennifer has trouble convincing her boyfriend of the ghostly phenomena until he learns that his colleagues at the Home Office have lied to him.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: When Jonas vanishes and Mathis becomes the prime suspect in a murder, Jennifer discovers that the conspiracy is greater than she ever imagined.
episodes.title: Episode 3

video.title: Residue
video.synopsis: After a freak explosion wreaks havoc on a sprawling city of the future, eight survivors get caught up in the aftermath and its paranormal effects.
